title: Spectator Out Loud: Christina Lamb, Simon Clarke and Hannah Moore
description: On this week's episode, Christina Lamb reads her letter from Kabul about the situation on the ground under the new Taliban control (00:56). Simon Clarke makes the case for Covid boosters (06:19). And Hannah Moore talks about the horrors of so-called 'American' sweet shops in the West End (15:18).
itunes:author: The Spectator
dc:creator: The Spectator
